interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: C'est Moi Gentle Cleansing Water | Gentle, Fragrance-Free Cleanser Removes Makeup and Refreshes Skin, Made with Cornflower Water, Aloe Vera, and Strawberry, Kiwi, and Apple Extracts | 5.9 fl oz.
Review Date: 2020/08/05
Store: C'est Moi
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone,Sensitive', 'Brand': "C'est Moi", 'Scent': 'Kiwi, Strawberry, Unscented, Aloe Vera', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '1.84 x 1.84 x 6.06 inches; 7.69 Ounces', 'UPC': '039897626055'}
Review Text: Not bad for gentle cleansing water. I was able to remove a lot of impurities and not irritate my dry sensitive skin. However, it's soap-free but when I took the bottle out, it started bubbling. I think you can see them in my picture. And it felt like a lightweight liquid soap. I double cleanse so it doesn't matter if there is residue but I don't think I wouldn’t leave it on without rinsing after. It's still really good cleansing water for the price point!
Review Title: Gentle Cleansing Water Indeed
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Trophy Wife Cosmetics Lipstick - Semi Matte - Natural, Vegan & Cruelty Free Anna
Trophy Wife
{'Brand': 'Trophy Wife', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Stick', 'Finish Type': 'Semi-Matte, Glossy', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting,Shine,Moisturizing,Clean,Long-lasting,Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '3.1 x 1 x 1 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '670924966586'}
I am in love with this lipstick! The packaging looks luxurious to me and really stands out from my collection. I went with this shade which is a bright red with orange tones. It just goes with everything I wear and surprisingly my hair color at the moment. I also like how versatile this is so I can dress up or down with this color. It is 100% vegan, made with plant based wax and other natural ingredients like candelilla wax, castor seed oil, shea butter, almond oil, grape seed oil, jojoba, and coconut oil. The lipstick feels very smooth when applying and it I didn’t need a liner. And I think I reapplied when I remembered to after 3 hours and held up fine without any chapping or colorless patches. This is cruelty-free too!
Favorite new lipstick
Catrice | SUNGASM Luminizing Bronzer 01 | For A Sun-Kissed Shimmery Finish | Highly Pigmented & Blendable | Vegan, Paraben Free, Oil Free | Cruelty Free
Catrice
{'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Brand': 'Catrice', 'Color': 'C01 Golden Ecstasy', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Product Dimensions': '2.72 x 2.72 x 0.51 inches; 1.27 Ounces'}
It’s such a beautiful warm bronzer! Great for the summertime to get that golden goddess glow. I love the embossing and the packaging is very compacted. It’s lightweight and I can throw it into my bag to carry it with me.
Luminous Bronzer

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preferences:** Enjoys cosmetics, particularly semi-matte lip products and bronzers for a sun-kissed look; has recently expanded interest to include gentle cleansing products that effectively remove impurities while being soothing for sensitive skin.
- **Values:** Strongly favors vegan and cruelty-free products, emphasizing a commitment to ethical and clean beauty brands, and now prioritizes gentle formulations suitable for sensitive skin.
- **Aesthetic Preferences:** Appreciates luxurious packaging and vibrant colors; maintains a fondness for bright red shades with orange tones and beautifully crafted bronzers, alongside aesthetically pleasing cleansing products.
- **Application Experience:** Prefers lipsticks that are smooth to apply without requiring additional products like lip liners; values long-lasting wear, comfort, and moisturizing benefits in lip products, while also seeking effective and gentle cleansing experiences for her skincare routine.
- **Use Cases:** Looks for versatility in makeup that complements various outfits and occasions; seeks products that enhance her summer glow and are suitable for double cleansing routines.
- **Overall Satisfaction:** Demonstrates a high level of satisfaction with products aligning with her ethical and performance-related values; actively seeks items that deliver quality, aesthetic appeal, and effective skincare solutions.
